Sir Thomas Ouerburie his wife with new elegies vpon his (now knowne) vntimely death : whereunto are annexed, new newes and characters / written by himselfe and other learned gentlemen. Overbury, Thomas, Sir, 1581-1613.
Edition septima.
[251] p. : port.
Printed by Edward Griffin for Laurence L'isle, and are to bee sold at his shop at the Tigers head in Pauls Church-yard, London : 16[16]
Date of imprint defaced; date suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Signatures: [par.]⁸(-[par.]1) A-M⁸ O-P⁸ Q⁷. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
=======
